sentences: On Thursday, 30 August, a workshop took place on Financing Options for the Full Implementation of Results-based Actions Relating to REDD+, including Modalities and Procedures for Financing.
For detailed coverage of the workshop, see http://www.iisd.ca/vol12/enb12549e.html On Friday, 31 August, two workshops were held on: a Framework for Various Approaches; and the new market mechanism.

For detailed coverage, see http://www.iisd.ca/vol12/enb12550e.html On Sunday, 2 September, two workshops took place on: Quantified Economy-wide Emission Reduction Targets by Developed Country Parties; and Understanding of the Diversity of NAMAs by Developing Country Parties, Underlying Assumptions, and any support needed for implementation of these actions.
